title: ICE in _match.rs:1184:21 when building "gfx-backend-metal" on Nightly

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-nightly
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to nightly.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-bisection
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs bisection: https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo-bisect-rustc

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

labels.name: ICEBreaker-Cleanup-Crew
labels.description: Helping to "clean up" bugs with minimal examples and bisections

body:
We are seeing a new ICE on macOS/Nightly: https://github.com/gfx-rs/wgpu-native/runs/700057380

### Meta
```
rustc 1.45.0-nightly (9310e3bd4 2020-05-21)
```

Backtrace:
